title: Adult Education-Based Academic Library Librarian Professional Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Operated through a blended model of online learning platforms and offline workshops, where participants engage in self-directed learning and collaborative tasks using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners Can Design Three or More Educational Program Proposals Reflecting the Characteristics of Adult Learners (Aged 40+) (e.g., Preference for Experience-Based Learning, Practical Goal Orientation) and Achieve an Average Suitability Score of ≥4/5 from Peer Reviews and Expert Feedback
Develop an information literacy education module based on transformative learning theory.
Improve library services by applying strategies for building practice-oriented learning communities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
